Value: ARC Funds Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm invests in the private equity markets across the globe. It operates as a closed-end strategic and specialist investor in Australian listed securities. It operates in two businesses: strategic equity investment, and funds management and financial services. ARC Funds Limited was founded in 1979 and is based in Brisbane, Australia.
